item.title: From the Midlands back to Mirpur
item.author: Kahfeel Hussain,Omar Hafeez-Bore,
item.description: _Read part one “From Mirpur to the Midlands” _ People grow roots slowly; it happens unseen, and unknown. Certainly they were hidden from the Mirpuri men who came here 40 years ago, intending to spend some years working and sending money back from the verdant land of Valaid, of England. â€¦
